```{r load packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(nflfastR)
library(nflplotR)
library(ggrepel)
```

```{r example nflfastr}
stats_2022 <- load_player_stats(seasons = 2022) 
comp_pct_2022 <- stats_2022 %>%
  filter(position == "QB") %>% 
  group_by(player_name) %>% 
  summarise(comp_pct = sum(completions) / sum(attempts)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(comp_pct))
week6_2022 <- stats_2022 %>% 
  filter(week == 6) %>% 
  select(player_name, recent_team, receiving_yards, receiving_tds) %>% 
  arrange(desc(receiving_yards))
head(comp_pct_2022)
head(week6_2022)
```
